channel.title: A few questions (need help)
channel.description:
these are the things i need help with as much as possible.
1. i would like to add a shop (that i have) that has rares in (that i have) and i want it so people can only buy with their pking points. if this is possible, then please help as much as i have no idear what code i will need to put.
2. fixed.
IF anyone can help me, then please do so. thanks,
~luke.

item.title: A few questions (need help)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

how would i make a shop with working pk points only?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions (need help)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

With no < or >, Like this.

        if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
            try {
                int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
                if (newItemID == 777){
                    sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
                } else if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                    addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
            }
        }

Read full topic

if(newItemID == [b][/b]) {
To a item id.

item.title: A few questions (need help)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

It checks the item ID;

if(newItemID == <ITEMID>) {

If the item id is the same to the one you speicifed, then it will execute this code;

sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");

ELSE, if the item id is not the same & newItemID is lower then 30,000 but higher then 0;

} else if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {

Execute this code,

addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);

ELSE, anything diffrent, execute this code.

sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions (need help)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if(newItemID == <ITEMID>) { sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); } else if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

Read full topic
